sentences.en: A European evergreen fern ( Phyllitis scolopendrium ) with narrow, undivided fronds.
sentences.cn: 荷叶蕨一种产于欧洲的有不可分割窄叶的常绿蕨类植物 ( 对开蕨对开蕨属 )

sentences.en: Adults rarely give the television their undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 成年人很少会专心地看电视。

sentences.en: I’ll give the matter my undivided attention.
It won't take much to grab someone's undivided attention this week.
sentences.cn: 摩羯:不必为了吸引某人的目光而花太多的心思.

sentences.en: Students are listening with undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 学生们正在专心地听讲.

sentences.en: The paintings she produced in those months won undivided admiration.
sentences.cn: 她那几个月里创作的画作备受推崇。

sentences.en: The students listened to the teacher with undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 学生们全神贯注地听老师讲课.

sentences.en: This problem claims our undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 这个问题值得我们密切注意.

sentences.en: Tom seldom got his mother's undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 汤姆很少受到母亲全心的关怀.

sentences.en: We will live for love united. Come together undivided.
sentences.cn: 我们将会为爱心联盟而生活.团结一心不可分离.

sentences.en: Work that motivates your ideals will capture your undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 一心一意地工作一直是你的动力.

sentences.en: You have my ( full and ) undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 你是我一心 ( 一意 ) 注意的人.

sentences.en: You must be prepared to give the job your undivided attention .
sentences.cn: 你必须准备好全心全意地投入工作。

words.tran_cn: 专心的；专一的；未分开的；完整的

trans.tran_cn: 未分开的，全神贯注的，一心一意的，得到某人的全心关注
未分开（undivide的过去式和过去分词）
